items.thread_title: Local renters break down Arafat’s housing plan
items.author: u/SouthSoundHousing
items.snippet: Neighborhood advocates in Olympia are walking through how the campaign’s anti-price-gouging plank would help tenants.

items.thread_title: Town hall takeaways on healthcare and costs
items.author: @civicwatch.pnw
items.snippet: A live thread captured Adam’s answers on lowering drug prices, ending junk fees, and protecting rural clinics.

items.thread_title: Local labor council discusses endorsing Arafat
items.author: @SouthSoundLabor
items.snippet: Union members are sharing why they back the campaign’s apprenticeship and prevailing wage commitments.

items.author: Lacey Veterans Network
items.snippet: Attendees are comparing notes on Adam’s commitments to VA access, transition support, and military family housing.

items.thread_title: Transit riders react to the south sound commuter plan
items.author: u/CapitolLakeCommuter
items.snippet: Commuters are digging into the proposal for more reliable bus frequency between Olympia, Lacey, and Tacoma.

items.thread_title: Keeping taxes down for families under $400k
items.author: Arafat for Congress
items.snippet: Every part of the economic plan supports working families and will not raise taxes on anyone making under $400,000 a year.

items.thread_title: Fighting for affordable healthcare and lower costs
items.author: Arafat for Congress
items.snippet: Adam is pushing to make healthcare affordable, lower drug prices, and protect Social Security and Medicare.

items.thread_title: Better jobs, wages, and protections for workers
items.author: Arafat for Congress
items.snippet: The campaign is focused on creating good-paying jobs, strengthening unions, and expanding apprenticeship opportunities.
